name: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Aiko's Choice
summary: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Aiko's Choice is a tactical game about a team of specialists who are tasked with eliminating their opponents by assassinating or sabotaging them. Depending on your style of game play, violence is present: For most missions, there are non-lethal ways to neutralize your opponents, but if you choose to kill them to reach your goal, there will be blood.
